listing_reserve.flexible_description: By been a flexible Booking, you can cancel your reservation in the next 3 days after reservation paying an extra of 2Ä and recovering their money for future Bookings
listing_reserve.is_flexible_description: You can cancel your reservation and will get your money back for future Bookings
listing_reserve.amount_provider_description: Service Fee. (This helps us run our platform and offer service like 24/7 support on your trip. It includes VAT)
listing_reserve.amount_salved: Your Balance of flexible Bookings who were canceled earlier.
listing_reserve.ask_review_msg_success: We've sent an email to the customer requesting their review on their stay at the room.
listing_reserve.extra_persons_info: When adding an extra or more people, the price to pay at the hotel may vary depending on the amount of extra people. So according to the category of the same the rate to pay will be different.
listing_reserve.extra_child_age_info: If you travel with childs with more than 2 years old r with more than 2 persons yous must contact with the hotel to check the extra charges
listing_reserve.extra_general_details: Please note that any extra beds or cribs must be requested and confirmed by the hotel in advance. They can be requested using the Special Requests box during booking. THESE SERVICES CAN CARRY EXTRA CHARGES.
listing_reserve.agree_termns: Im agree with termns and coditions about cancel book
listing_reserve.complete_payment_not_card_subheader: Can I make a reservation without a credit card? (Click for details)
listing_reserve.complete_payment_not_card_details: A valid credit card is needed to guarantee your reservation with most hotels. We do offer a small but growing number of hotels, however, that will guarantee your reservation without a credit card. You can also make a booking using someone else’s card provided you have their permission. In this case please confirm the card holder’s name and that you have permission to use their card, in the ‘Special Requests’ box when making your booking.
listing_reserve.introduce_info: Enter details to hold your booking
listing_reserve.cvs_code_none: You do not need to enter a CVC code for this booking.
listing_reserve.text_cond4: and privacy policy by booking this room.

insert.complete_register_without_payment: We have confirmed the booking. Dont need to make payment to Instabono.com because you had enough credit accumulated from previous flexible Booking. You can check your reservations on your user profile.
insert.complete_payment_subheader: You must enter your bank account details to complete the reserve.
insert.confirmation_header: The reservation has been completed successfully
insert.confirmation_subheader: You can cancel your reservation at any time taking into account that the charges to be paid were accepted by you at the time of booking.

insert_pre.confirmation_header: The pre-reservation has been completed successfully
insert_pre.confirmation_subheader: The pre-reservation has been completed and you must wait the confirmation. You should check your e-mail in wait of notification. You can cancel your reservation at any time taking into account that the charges to be paid were accepted by you at the time of booking.
